description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2023-Feb-08 10:56:23

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

TyreSensorType.title: Tyre Sensor Type
TyreSensorType.description: Specifies the sensor type that determines Tyre Pressure.

oneOf.title: Continental
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure determined by Continental Sensor using Tire1 j1939 Message 0x18FEF433

oneOf.title: PressurePro
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure determined by Pressure Pro Sensor using Tire2 j1939 Message 0x18FC4233

oneOf.title: Generic
oneOf.description: Tyre Pressure sensor specifics are handled by the Truck VSM, presenting a common/generic interface to the Telemetry Device.

TyreLocation.description: Units: Location. Location/Position of Tyre on Asset/Truck. Specified at time of sensor installation. Common location code used is LS 4bits represent tyre position along axle, MS 4bits represent axle number.

TyreSensorStatus.title: Tyre Sensor Status
TyreSensorStatus.description: Units: Status. Specifies the status of a particular tyre's sensor.

TyreStatus.title: Tyre Status
TyreStatus.description: Units: Status. Specifies the status of a particular tyre.

TyrePressure.description: Units: 1 kPa/Bit. Current Pressure of one of Asset's/Truck's tyres.

TyreTemp.title: Tyre Temperature
TyreTemp.description: Units: 0.03125 degC/bit, offset -273 degC. Current Temperature of one of Asset's/Truck's tyres.

TyreTempDetectSensor.title: Tyre Temperature Threshold Detection (Sensor)
TyreTempDetectSensor.description: Units: Status. Specifies the tyre pressure sensor determined temperature fault status.

TyrePressDetect.title: Tyre Pressure Threshold Detection
TyrePressDetect.description: Units: Status. Specifies the tyre pressure sensor determined pressure fault status.

TPMS_HighTempWarning.title: Tyre Over Temperature Warning
TPMS_HighTempWarning.description: Units: DegC. Specifies the tyre temperature threshold over which trigger the telemetry device to record/report the occurrence. Note: A value of 1736 disables FM1 temperature monitoring. Note: Tyre status reporting only occurs on trucks fitted with either Continental or Pressure Pro TPMS sensors. Note: The Pressure Pro TPMS sensor has built in tyre temperature monitoring, and provides an over temperature alert. This setting controls the Telemetry Device's internal tyre temperature monitoring, which is separate to the on-sensor monitoring.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

TyreAirLeakage.title: Tyre Air Leakage Rate
TyreAirLeakage.description: Units: 0.1 Pa/s per bit. Air leakage rate of one of Asset's/Truck's tyres.

TyreRefPressure.title: Reference Tyre Pressure
TyreRefPressure.description: Units: 1 kPa/bit. Defined by j1939 Tire2 message 0x18FC4233 / PGN 64953.

TyreElectFault.title: Wheel End Electrical Fault
TyreElectFault.description: Units: Status. Specifies whether an electrical fault is present on the sensor.

TyreExtSupport.title: Extended Tyre Pressure Support
TyreExtSupport.description: Units: Status. Specifies whether the extended tyre pressure field is used providing a larger pressure reading range.

TyreTempDetectTelem.title: Tyre Temperature Threshold Detection (Telemetry)
TyreTempDetectTelem.description: Units: Status. Specifies the telemetry determined tyre temperature fault status, based on over temperature threshold.
